    Experience

    Data Research Volunteer - Mays Business School | June 2024 - Present

    • Analyzing and recommending actionable financial strategies for modern business using CI/CD pipelines, SSMS, ETL/ELT, Data Warehousing & Business Intelligence; reducing costs, and improving forecasting.
    • Interpreting, cleansing, and aggregating raw data by pulling from various complex data sources using Redshift to increase accuracy and usability via a data-driven decision-making approach.

    Data Analyst - Atlas Energy Solutions | May 2023 - July 2023

    • Implemented dashboards, SLAs, KPIs, metrics, graphs, charts, & CI/CD pipelines using ETL & Azure Logic Apps to create automated reports to compute operational efficiency, reducing manual efforts by 76% & manual errors by 89%.
    • Developed point filtration system using Python & Numpy to take large-scale geospatial datasets, and filter most traveled routes on a highway, reducing existing points from 20.3k to 7.4k and improving code quality and latency.
    • Evaluated, and presented the risks & efficiency of the OCR Model by building queries/macros using Microsoft Excel & Power BI to accurately detect textual data from images, identifying & reducing inconsistencies by 92%.

    Graduate Research Assistant - Mays Business School | August 2022 - May 2023

    • Facilitate seamless student score management, Seminars, Q&A sessions, in Business Information Systems and Fundamentals of Information Systems.
    • Attended and guided lab seminars to assist students and Professors with Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Access, SQL, and Python.

    Data Engineer - WIPRO ltd. | Aug 2017 - Aug 2022

    • Led a team of 8 to design, implement, deploy, & support modern AI and analytic operations and processes on Python, Azure Data Factory & Azure DataBricks, automating 86% of manual tasks, reducing incidents by 64%, and increasing scalability.
    • Performed end-to-end migration of on-premise employee data to Azure cloud by delivering Synapse CI/CD Pipelines and a centralized data lake, increasing performance by 2x speed.
    • Planned, conceptualized, troubleshooted implementation of customized dashboards, flexible reporting solutions, & key business insights through SAP BO, SAP HANA, PowerBI for 650,000 internal employees, maintaining a CSAT of over 95%.
    • Created a highly responsive front-end dashboard for a web-based user interface using Powershell, Visual Basic, Android 2, and React JS to perform navigation & real-time analysis for 12 external clients.
